name: Buddy
description: Buddy the Whale is a happy-go-lucky addition to the Boyâ€™s Club narrative. He has been brought back to life after being beached by the prior dev and relaunched into the blue waters of the crypto ecosystem by an experienced team, rabid community, and friends.
